message.content: Find and compare the UXP plugin modules (splice-plugin/js/*.js) vs CEP plugin modules (splice-cep/panel/js/*.js). List all JS files in both directories and identify which modules exist in UXP but are missing in CEP. Be thorough - list every .js file in both locations.

content.text:
Now let me create a comprehensive comparison report. Let me compile all the information I've gathered:

## Complete UXP vs CEP JS Plugin Module Comparison

### UXP Plugin JS Files (splice-plugin/js/) - 17 Files

1. **main.js** - Core workflow orchestration, preview, markers, presets UI
2. **builder.js** - v3.5 Direct DOM sequence building
3. **config.js** - Constants, getBackendUrl(), fetchWithTimeout(), parseErrorResponse(), offline detection
4. **utils.js** - Shared utilities (formatTime, setStatus, getActiveSequence)
5. **settings.js** - Custom presets CRUD, duplicate, export/import, localStorage
6. **credits.js** - Credit balance, tier display
7. **slice1-timeline.js** - Timeline reading utilities (legacy)
8. **slice3-export.js** - Audio export utilities (legacy)
9. **slice6-analyze.js** - Takes data management utility
10. **slice7-apply.js** - Apply takes to timeline
11. **slice8-silence.js** - Silence removal from timeline
12. **slice9-razor.js** - XML razor workflow (legacy)
13. **multitrack.js** - Multitrack UI, speaker config, distribution chart, decision list
14. **animatedCaptions.js** - Caption template UI, preview, export, timeline apply (Phase 7)
15. **textEditor.js** - Text-based editing UI, undo/redo, search, preview (Phase 7)
16. **socialReframe.js** - Social reframe UI, platform presets, safe zone overlay (Phase 7)
17. **music.js** - Music generation UI, song ID, library, audio preview, timeline import (Phase 8)

### CEP Plugin JS Files (splice-cep/panel/js/) - 4 Files

1. **CSInterface.js** - Adobe CEP interface wrapper
2. **config.js** - JSX bridge, backend config, auth headers
3. **builder.js** - Cut list processing, markers, razor via JSX
4. **main.js** - Workflow orchestration, preview, modals

---

## Missing Modules in CEP (Not Ported)

The following **13 modules** exist in UXP but are **missing entirely from CEP**:

| Module | Purpose | Phase |
|--------|---------|-------|
| **utils.js** | Shared utilities (formatTime, setStatus, getActiveSequence) | Core |
| **settings.js** | Custom presets CRUD, duplicate, export/import, localStorage | Core |
| **credits.js** | Credit balance, tier display | Core |
| **slice1-timeline.js** | Timeline reading utilities | Legacy |
| **slice3-export.js** | Audio export utilities | Legacy |
| **slice6-analyze.js** | Takes data management utility | Phase 1 |
| **slice7-apply.js** | Apply takes to timeline | Phase 1 |
| **slice8-silence.js** | Silence removal from timeline | Phase 1 |
| **slice9-razor.js** | XML razor workflow | Phase 1 |
| **multitrack.js** | Multitrack UI, speaker config, distribution chart | Phase 2 |
| **animatedCaptions.js** | Caption template UI, preview, export | Phase 7 |
| **textEditor.js** | Text-based editing UI, undo/redo | Phase 7 |
| **socialReframe.js** | Social reframe UI, platform presets | Phase 7 |
| **music.js** | Music generation UI, song ID, library | Phase 8 |

---

## Modules Present in Both (Partially Ported)

| Module | UXP Version | CEP Version | Status |
|--------|-------------|-------------|--------|
| **config.js** | Full feature set: getBackendUrl(), fetchWithTimeout(), parseErrorResponse(), offline detection | JSX bridge, backend config, auth headers | Different implementations - CEP is simpler |
| **builder.js** | v3.5 Direct DOM sequence building with transaction support | Cut list processing, markers, razor via JSX | Different architectures (DOM API vs JSX) |
| **main.js** | Comprehensive: workflow orchestration, preview, markers, presets UI | Workflow orchestration, preview, modals | CEP has reduced functionality |

---

## Summary

- **UXP Plugin**: 17 JS modules covering all phases (1-8)
- **CEP Plugin**: Only 4 JS modules, missing 13 advanced features
- **Gap**: CEP implementation is minimal/legacy. It lacks:
  - Settings/presets management
  - Credits display
  - All Phase 1-8 advanced features (multitrack, captions, text editor, social reframe, music)
  - Shared utilities and helpers

The CEP version appears to be a basic legacy implementation focused on core functionality, while the UXP version is a complete, feature-rich modern plugin with all advanced features from Phases 1-8.
